It made my hemmerhoids itch so bad it was unbearable. Tucks work good though. No hydrocortisone for me down there!!!!
I am using this cream since last 20 days..but no effect

My doctor prescribed me Hydrocortisone Suppositories 25mg, for my Hemorrhoids; after taking 1 suppository for 3 days, instead of it getting better I could no longer even get another up in me, I had swollen so much and my anus itched and I was bleeding terrible for about 5 days with light diarrhea, until I finally gave in and went to see my doctor again, which we talked, I disagreed to do the surgery, she gave me some PH Cream; Today, almost 2 weeks from my last suppository given, I pooped a lot and there was clumps of what looked like white pencil in my poop, It was un-dissolved Suppositories.  I feel so much better now and much lighter feeling after 3 bowel movements.  I will never take a suppository again.

My hemorrhoids have became worse with hydrocortisone, and has also cause two new ones to form. My hemorrhoids never bothered me until my doctor prescribed this medication to me. Now they’re immensely swollen and burn constantly. I really don’t recommend hydrocortisone for people who have reverse side effects to commonly used medications especially if you’re not sure if you are allergic to it or not.

The second time I used it, it eased the burning and pain, on the third day all symptoms it has completely disappeared. I feel like I finally found the perfect product.

Proctozone HC (hydrocortisone):My doctor prescribed this when I had a pretty bad hemorrhoid flare-up . It was supposed to shrink the tissue. Little did I know that this caused me extreme swelling, redness and horrible itchiness all over my genitalia after only one application on my hemorrhoids.I contacted the doctor asking if this could be an allergic reaction but she said it was likely from the sitzbaths I had been taking with Epsom salts so I continued using it for about 6 days and my symptoms got progressively worse! I will never use a steroid / hydrocortisone in my life again. After finding out about all the side effects, what good of use is this!?
